channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 萨巴伦卡在第二次获得澳大利亚公开赛冠军后为球队欢呼
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka paid special tribute to her team of coaches after retaining the Australian Open title in emphatic style to win her second Grand Slam title on Saturday.翻译:阿琳娜·萨巴伦卡在周六以坚定的方式卫冕澳大利亚公开赛冠军并赢得她的第二个大满贯冠军后，向她的教练团队表示了特别的敬意。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 萨巴伦卡力压郑智卫冕澳网冠军
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka continued to be an irrepressible force at the Australian Open as she powered to a 6-3 6-2 victory over Chinese 12th seed Zheng Qinwen on Saturday to successfully defend her title and add a second Grand Slam trophy to her cabinet.翻译:周六，萨巴伦卡在澳网继续发挥不可阻挡的力量，她以6-3 6-2击败中国12号种子郑钦文，成功卫冕，为她的内阁增添了第二座大满贯奖杯。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 澳大利亚网球公开赛女单冠军阿琳娜·萨巴伦卡
item.description: Factbox on Belarus' Aryna Sabalenka, who beat China's Zheng Qinwen 6-3 6-2 in the Australian Open final on Saturday to win her second Grand Slam title.翻译:白俄罗斯选手阿丽娜·萨巴伦卡 (Aryna Sabalenka) 在周六的澳大利亚网球公开赛决赛中以 6-3 6-2 击败中国选手郑钦文，赢得了她的第二个大满贯冠军。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 萨巴伦卡击败中国选手郑重卫冕澳网冠军
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka beat China's Zheng Qinwen 6-3 6-2 to retain the Australian Open women's singles title on Saturday.翻译:周六，萨巴伦卡以6比3、6比2击败中国选手郑钦文，卫冕澳网女单冠军。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 广州率先全面放宽大房限购
item.description: China's major southern city of Guangzhou fully relaxed home purchase limits for some people on Saturday and said it would increase affordable housing supply, in a move to support the local property market.翻译:中国南方主要城市广州周六全面放宽部分人的购房限制，并表示将增加保障性住房供应，以支持当地房地产市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 波音737 MAX降落中国，结束积压订单进口冻结
item.description: China, which was the first country to ground MAX jets after two MAX 8 accidents in 2018 and 2019 that killed nearly 350 people.翻译:2018年和2019年发生两起造成近350人死亡的MAX 8事故后，中国成为第一个停飞MAX飞机的国家。
item.author: Lisa Barrington

item.title: 2023年中国工业利润下降2.3%
item.description: Profits at China's industrial firms fell 2.3% in 2023, their second straight yearly decline, due to sluggish demand at home and abroad, adding pressure on economic growth amid a deep property slump and deflationary risks.翻译:由于国内外需求低迷，2023年中国工业企业利润下降2.3%，连续第二年下降，房地产深度下滑和通货紧缩风险加大了经济增长压力。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo

item.title: 图瓦卢亲台湾领导人在全国选举中失去席位
item.description: The pro-Taiwan leader of the Pacific Islands nation of Tuvalu, Kausea Natano, lost his seat in an election closely watched by Taiwan, China and the U.S., results showed on Saturday.翻译:周六的结果显示，太平洋岛国图瓦卢的亲台湾领导人考西亚·纳塔诺(Kausea Natano)在台湾、中国和美国密切关注的选举中失去了席位。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 朝鲜和中国高级特使会晤同意捍卫共同利益
item.description: North Korea and China agreed to strengthen tactical cooperation and defend common interests, the North's official KCNA news agency said on Saturday, reporting on Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui's meeting with Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Sun Weidong.翻译:朝鲜官方通讯社朝中社周六在报道外交部长崔善姬与中国外交部副部长孙卫东会面时表示，朝鲜和中国同意加强战术合作并捍卫共同利益。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 耶伦表示，尽管金融动荡，中国告诉美国官员其银行“表现良好”
item.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Friday that Treasury officials visiting Beijing recently received assurances that Chinese banks are "doing well" despite turmoil in the country's financial and real estate markets, adding that she did not see large spillovers to the U.S. economy at this stage.翻译:美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦周五表示，尽管中国金融和房地产市场动荡，但访问北京的财政部官员最近得到了中国银行业“表现良好”的保证，并补充说，她认为现阶段不会对美国经济产生重大溢出效应。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 瞄准中国，美国提出“了解你的客户”云计算要求
item.description: The Biden administration is proposing requiring U.S. cloud companies to determine whether foreign entities are accessing U.S. data centers to train AI models, U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Friday.翻译:美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多周五表示，拜登政府提议要求美国云公司确定外国实体是否正在访问美国数据中心来训练人工智能模型。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 白宫表示，红海、中国对美国经济的风险似乎得到遏制
item.description: The United States risks some exposure to China's economic slowdown and shipping disruptions in the Red Sea, but they appear contained, President Joe Biden's top economic adviser said on Friday, adding that the U.S. economy is "upbeat."翻译:总统乔·拜登的高级经济顾问周五表示，美国可能会受到中国经济放缓和红海航运中断的影响，但这些风险似乎得到了遏制，并补充说美国经济“乐观”。
item.author: Trevor Hunnicutt

item.title: 中国恒大集团对母公司提起法律诉讼
item.description: Evergrande Property Services said on Friday its units have started legal proceedings against parent China Evergrande to recover 11.4 billion yuan ($1.59 billion) of pledge guarantees on deposit certificates.翻译:恒大物业服务周五表示，其子公司已对母公司中国恒大提起法律诉讼，要求追回114亿元人民币（合15.9亿美元）的存款单质押担保。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报道中国在中美会谈前进行“战斗巡逻”
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it detected 23 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Friday, ahead of high-level China-U.S. talks in Thailand.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周五在泰国举行中美高层会谈之前，发现有 23 架中国空军飞机在台湾周围活动，并与中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国股票基金周度资金流入创2015年以来最高纪录——美国银行
item.description: Investors poured almost $12 billion into Chinese equity funds in the week to Wednesday in the largest inflow since 2015 and the second largest ever, a BofA Global Research report showed on Friday - a positive sign for battered Chinese stocks.翻译:美银美林周五发布的全球研究报告显示，截至周三的一周内，投资者向中国股票基金注入了近 120 亿美元，这是自 2015 年以来最大的资金流入，也是有史以来的第二大资金流入，这对遭受重创的中国股市来说是一个积极的信号。
item.author: Alun John

item.title: 持有美股的中国基金暂停交易以平息投资者狂热
item.description: A Shanghai-listed fund that holds U.S. stocks took the unusual step of suspending trading on Friday, saying it was necessary to protect investors after prices hit record levels in a scramble for overseas assets.翻译:一家持有美国股票的上海上市基金周五采取了不同寻常的暂停交易举措，称在争夺海外资产的过程中股价创下历史新高后，有必要保护投资者。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国开启农历新年旅游热潮 预计旅游人数将达90亿人次
item.description: China on Friday kicked off its busiest annual period of mass migration with a record 9 billion domestic trips expected to be made during a 40-day travel rush around the Lunar New Year holidays, state media predicted.翻译:官方媒体预测，中国周五拉开了年度最繁忙的大规模人口流动时期的序幕，预计农历新年假期前后 40 天的旅游高峰期间，国内旅游人数将达到创纪录的 90 亿人次。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 恒大可能的清算以及接下来会发生什么
item.description: A key offshore bondholder group of China Evergrande plans to join a petition to liquidate the developer at a hearing in a Hong Kong court on Monday, Reuters reported this week.翻译:据路透社本周报道，中国恒大的一个主要离岸债券持有人集团计划在周一香港法院的听证会上加入清算该开发商的请愿书。
item.author: Clare Jim, Scott Murdoch

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，中国敦促伊朗遏制胡塞武装在红海的袭击
item.description: Chinese officials have asked their Iranian counterparts to help rein in attacks on ships in the Red Sea by the Iran-backed Houthis, or risk harming business relations with Beijing, four Iranian sources and a diplomat familiar with the matter said.翻译:四名伊朗消息人士和一名知情外交官表示，中国官员已要求伊朗同行帮助制止伊朗支持的胡塞武装在红海对船只的袭击，否则可能会损害与北京的商业关系。
item.author: Parisa Hafezi, Andrew Hayley

item.title: 中国音乐学生因威胁民主活动人士在美国被判有罪
item.description: A Chinese music student was convicted on Thursday of U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement.翻译:周四，一名中国音乐学生因美国指控骚扰一名在波士顿伯克利音乐学院张贴支持中国民主传单的活动人士而被定罪，并威胁要向中国执法部门举报她的活动。
item.author: Nate Raymond
